name: MightyRighty
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mighty righty
des:
1) Always start talking to Mighty Righty like so: 
Alexa, open Mighty Righty!

2) Then ask, using this sample: 
Who is right ME OR MY husband (mother, sister, wife, brother, daughter, etc)? 

Pay attention, combination "me or my" should always be present in the question.

If Mighty Righty can't answer your question, use only personal pronouns (that would replace virtually any noun defining a person). Ex:

Who is right, me or them/her/him?

Mighty Righty helps avoid arguing and confrontation by stating who is right, it doesn't mean you have to follow what Mighty Righty says, and of course this application is supposed to be just a joke, but a very helpful one as it comes from real life necessities. We know now who is right! Have fun!
P.S. If you need instructions how to ask who is right, you can say: Help
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
